text: Big Brother 14 is the upcoming fourteenth season of the US reality television show Big Brother. The new season was announced during the season finale of Big Brother 13. Julie Chen will continue to host the season. The season premier is scheduled to air on CBS in July 2012. == References == == Other websites == *CBS Official Site *Global TV Official Site Category:2012 in American television Category:2012 television seasons Category:Big Brother seasons Category:American television seasons
title: Big Brother 14 (American season)
